Kampilla：A city in Uttarapañcāla，and probably its capital．Dummukha was once its king （J．iii．379； J．ii．214； also Mtu．i．283）．

Sometimes （E．g．，J．iii．79； iv．396； v．21； vi．391； 464） Kampilla is spoken of as being a kingdom，of which Uttarapañcala was a city．

Once Alīnasattu is spoken of as Kampilla because he was the king of the city of the same name．J．v．34； see also Rāmāyana i．34．

kampilla：ကမ္ပိလ္လ （ပ）
တောသီတင်းပင်။ မြင်းခေါင်းနှာရောင်ပင်။
